Replace.Text: [COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_ABILITY_QIN_MELEE_UNITS_DESCRIPTION]This unit can use an action to convert adjacent Barbarians to your side, but it removes this unit. (Qin (Unifier))
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_AGENDA_COURT_INTRIGUE_DESCRIPTION]Likes civilizations who pose no threat. Dislikes civilizations with strong militaries or ones with nearby cities.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_AGENDA_COURT_INTRIGUE_NAME]Court Intrigue
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_AGENDA_SIHAI_DESCRIPTION]Wants all the Barbarians following his side. Does not like civilizations that destroy Barbarian Outposts.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_AGENDA_SIHAI_NAME]Sihai
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_AGENDA_YINDING_DESCRIPTION]Likes Civilizations with positive income per turn, dislikes civilizations with negative income per turn.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_AGENDA_YINDING_NAME]Yinding
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_CITY_NAME_SHEN_DU]Shendu
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]Friends are how we climb the ladder of our ambition.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]Let both benefit
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]Wonderful. I shall treat you as though you are my own child.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]May you learn from our example.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DELEGATION_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DELEGATION_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DELEGATION_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]Nearly all of your delegation have returned intact!

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DELEGATION_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]We have tried our best to educate your people on the merits of good governance, of propriety and tact. I am not sure we succeeded.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_MAKE_DEAL_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_MAKE_DEAL_FROM_AI_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]I know a good deal when I see one.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_MAKE_DEAL_FROM_AI_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]Trade is not so difficult when all agree.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]We have nothing to hide.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]The world is open, let us wander it.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]I would like to get to know you better.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]We are building a coalition of like-minded people. Shall you take part?
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_WAR_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_WAR_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_WAR_FROM_AI_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]My dear, the time has come for you to go.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_WAR_FROM_AI_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]Conquest by arms was never my aim, but we arrive at a point now where there is no alternative.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_WAR_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_WAR_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_WAR_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]Here come a bunch of men waving swords around and shouting. Or am I supposed to call this mess an "art?"
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DECLARE_WAR_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]You may as well seek to conquer heaven itself. Let us see how high your arrows fly.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DEFEAT_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_DEFEAT_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DEFEAT_FROM_AI_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]Please... I'm sure we could work something out. This doesn't have to be the end... does it?

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DEFEAT_FROM_AI_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]The road before me is dark, and black are the surrounding pines. Above I cannot see the heavens, and below I cannot see the earth.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DELEGATION_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_DELEGATION_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ANY}

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DELEGATION_FROM_AI_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]I send to you horses carved in jade, dancers from all the regions of China, and, as always the best silks our looms produce.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DELEGATION_FROM_AI_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]Silk and porcelain, tea and cloth - the lifeblood of the Chinese empire.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DENOUNCE_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_DENOUNCE_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DENOUNCE_FROM_AI_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]I have a long list of enemies. You are on that list. (Denounces You)
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DENOUNCE_FROM_AI_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]I have told you again and again to refrain from evil. Soon I will tire of the telling.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DENOUNCE_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_DENOUNCE_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DENOUNCE_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]Your words are sharp. Other things are sharper.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_DENOUNCE_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]The barking of dogs.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]I am Wu Zetian, the most feared and loved Empress in China. The only Empress in China.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]I am the Yongle Emperor, friend to those who would steer their trade ships in my direction, and terrible to those who oppose me.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_NEAR_INITIATOR_POSITIVE_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_NEAR_INITIATOR_POSITIVE_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_NEAR_INITIATOR_POSITIVE_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]Of course.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_NEAR_INITIATOR_POSITIVE_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]Heaven is for it.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_NO_MANS_INFO_EXCHANGE_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_NO_MANS_INFO_EXCHANGE_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_NO_MANS_INFO_EXCHANGE_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]All roads lead here, to the Zhou Empire.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_NO_MANS_INFO_EXCHANGE_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]We seek knowledge of the world. You are drawn towards the world's center.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_VISIT_RECIPIENT_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_VISIT_RECIPIENT_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_VISIT_RECIPIENT_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]Our capital has layers of history, art settled down into the very dust. Shall you see it?
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_VISIT_RECIPIENT_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]Come and see the Hall of Supreme Harmony, and let your thoughts be stilled.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_GREETING_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_GREETING_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_GREETING_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]Please sit. Have some tea. No, not that cup. This one I have made just for you.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_GREETING_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]I have been summoned - what is it?

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_KUDO_EXIT_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]Just as we cultivate the land before it bears fruit, so we cultivate the lesser peoples so that they might join with us.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_KUDO_EXIT_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]You've been such a comfort to me. As loyal as my eunuchs.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_KUDO_EXIT_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]We only deal with those who have something to offer. Like you, for instance.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_KUDO_LEADER_ANY_REASON_AGENDA_POSITIVE_INCOME](You have a positive income per turn.)
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_KUDOS_LEADER_ANY_REASON_AGENDA_IGNORES_BARBARIANS](You have ignored clearing Barbarian Camps.)
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_ALLIANCE_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_ALLIANCE_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_ALLIANCE_FROM_AI_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]Keep your friends close, and keep your --- I mean. Let us keep our friends close.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_ALLIANCE_FROM_AI_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]To be one with Ming, one with China - what could be greater?
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_AI_ACCEPT_DEAL_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_AI_ACCEPT_DEAL_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_AI_ACCEPT_DEAL_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]Death is so much more pleasant without all the shouting.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_AI_ACCEPT_DEAL_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]When there is peace in the land, there will be peace in the heavens.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_AI_REFUSE_DEAL_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_AI_REFUSE_DEAL_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_AI_REFUSE_DEAL_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]Shall you stop my rise upon the world's stage? I think not.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_AI_REFUSE_DEAL_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]You continue to resist the will of the center of all things.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_FROM_AI_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]This war has ceased to inspire.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_FROM_AI_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]War only makes widows. Surely there are more profitable pasttimes.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MODIFIER_DESCRIPTION_NEGATIVE_INCOME]Is saddened by your negative income
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MODIFIER_DESCRIPTION_POSITIVE_INCOME]They are pleased with your positive income
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MODIFIER_DESCRIPTION_SIHAI_ATTACKS_BARBARIANS]Is disappointed you are clearing Barbarian Outposts
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_MODIFIER_DESCRIPTION_SIHAI_IGNORES_BARBARIANS]They are pleased to see you not clearing Barbarian Outposts
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_AI_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]Let us measure the extent of both of our lands, that we might better know each other.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_AI_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]We have trade fleets and merchant caravans that seek access to your lands.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]I gain nothing from associating with you.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]We cannot accept such a thing
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]I have plenty of admirers, I'm afraid.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]A friend is an equal. You are not.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DELEGATION_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DELEGATION_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DELEGATION_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]Oh... This would have been interesting in the Han Dynasty. Now it's out of date, I'm afraid.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DELEGATION_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]We already have some of those.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_MAKE_DEAL_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_MAKE_DEAL_FROM_AI_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]You have more you can give.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_MAKE_DEAL_FROM_AI_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]I stood from my throne to listen to this?
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]No. The forbidden has an aspect of mystery, does it not?
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]You require our permission to enter, and we do not give it.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_EXIT_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]Is that all you are, a killer of the wild folk?
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_EXIT_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]You think I am here to be plotted against? I am the one that plots!
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_EXIT_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]We must seek wealth, from the ox-driver to the king.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_LEADER_ANY_REASON_AGENDA_ATTACKS_BARBARIANS](You have a attacked a Barbarian Camp.)
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_LEADER_ANY_REASON_AGENDA_NEGATIVE_INCOME](You have a negative income per turn.)
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_TOO_MANY_TROOPS_NEAR_ME_LEADER_QIN_ALT_ANY]{LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_TOO_MANY_TROOPS_NEAR_ME_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_TOO_MANY_TROOPS_NEAR_ME_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_ANY]Your presence here is… unsubtle.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_TOO_MANY_TROOPS_NEAR_ME_LEADER_YONGLE_ANY]We know well how to handle barbarian hordes on our frontier.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_QIN_ALT_CHAPTER_CAPSULE_BODY]Barbarians are your allies to recruit with your Melee units to unify the world under Qin’s banner.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_QIN_ALT_CHAPTER_DETAILED_BODY]Qin is best when he lets Barbarians begin their invasion, and then turns them over to his side, a strategy that may involve sacrificing a Melee unit to get an army of Barbarians. He can further protect his empire with the Great Wall’s added defense and the Crouching Tiger. Use his extra Eurekas and Inspirations to unlock more powerful units, and move forward to a Domination victory with your Barbarian converts.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_QIN_ALT_QUOTE]I have collected all the writings of the Empire and burnt those which were of no use.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_QIN_ALT_TITLE]Qin (Unifier)
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_QIN_TITLE]Qin (Mandate of Heaven)

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_CHAPTER_CAPSULE_BODY]There are those leaders who will fight you head-on, and then there is Wu Zetian. Her skills are launching offensive spy missions.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_CHAPTER_DETAILED_BODY]China under Wu Zetian focuses on building her empire up while tearing down her opponents’ civilization from the inside. Her bonuses toward Espionage give her an extra Spy and also help her offensive spy operations. When she is successful spying on her enemies, she receives [Icon_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture to advance in the Technology and Civics Trees. This [Icon_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture is even more useful when progressing, as Eurekas and Inspirations go even farther with China’s Dynastic Cycle ability. A Culture Victory is best with Wu Zetian, given her ability to steal Great Works easily and the Great Wall’s [ICON_Tourism] Tourism.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_CHAPTER_HISTORY_PARA_1]The first and only woman to sit on China’s throne, Wu Zetian got to where she got to via assassinations, manipulation, and cunning court strategy. While she was focused on the court, she also altered the way that Chinese politics worked towards a more meritocratic system and away from noble patronage.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_CHAPTER_HISTORY_PARA_2]We are accustomed to speaking of the 600s as a dark age. But this is a perspective that only sees Europe. In the rest of the world, this is a time of expansion and interconnection, whether or not this be about the growth of the Islamic world, the consolidation of the Chola empires, etc. In China, Tang was the re-emergence of a large empire in the wake of Han. But Tang went further, building a multi-ethnic series of dependencies as well as a flourishing of the arts that would set the stage for later and greater Chinese empires.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_CHAPTER_HISTORY_PARA_3]Tang was an era of court culture. Porcelain, tea, and all the profits from the Silk Road contributed to the empire’s success, and its capital of Chang’an was the largest city in the world in its time. Tribute systems, while not at the level of later Ming systems, were established, as well as protectorates that reached as far as India and Iran. Most of all, poetry and the arts were at their height during Tang.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_CHAPTER_HISTORY_PARA_4]A court culture needs a court villain. And here enters Wu Zetian. The Wu family were wealthy timber merchants, and, like many powerful families, it was the custom to send a daughter to be a concubine of the Imperial court under Emperor Taizong. But Taizong died, and the sickly Gaozong took over.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_CHAPTER_HISTORY_PARA_5]Gaozong had a wife, the Empress Wang, but favored and had children with a concubine, Xiao. Wang sought to divert Gaozong’s attention from this rival and sought to promote Wu within the court. It backfired. Wu rose, and both Wang and Xiao fell – and fell so badly that Wang had Wu’s daughter strangled in her crib (or, according to others, Wu killed her own daughter and blamed Wang for it). After their deaths in relative obscurity, Wu claimed to be haunted by their spirits.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_CHAPTER_HISTORY_PARA_6]Wu’s influence over Gaozong grew, especially as his health failed. Her influence was primarily focused on palace intrigue, although she did caution against a conquest of Goguryeo (northern Korea). She began advising him behind a pearl screen, being present at all of his meetings. Upon his death, her son, Li Zhe (the Zhongzong Emperor), takes over, but quickly favors his own in-laws instead of his mother. This set up a clash between the two families and between Wu’s shadow rule and the standard workings of power, a clash that Wu was to win. She deposed her own son and replaced him with his younger, more pliable brother, Li Dan (Ruizhong), in 684.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_CHAPTER_HISTORY_PARA_7]Here, Wu’s power was more nakedly open. She openly gave orders and, in 690, declared herself Empress regnant and founded her own dynasty, Zhou. She was the first and only woman to ever sit on China’s throne. But as she herself declined in later years, she began to rely more and more on her councilors, especially two brothers, Zhang Yizhi and Zhang Changzong. With power came ambition, and the two Zhang brothers began to resent any other connections or appointments that Wu would make outside of their own. Eventually, rivals in the court plot the Zhang brothers’ death, and, for once, Wu was unable to stop her enemies. The Zhang brothers were killed, and Wu – finally – deposed.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_CHAPTER_HISTORY_PARA_8]Domestically, Wu initiated a number of reforms that both reflected her own – relatively – humble origins as well as set barriers to anyone who would seek to follow in her footsteps. She initiated public reforms curbing female performers and putting limits on women’s fashion but also opened administrative examinations to all men, regardless of status. Further, in a stunning display of power, she eliminated entire branches of the imperial family, shifting the focus of power in China away from powerful families and towards the centralized bureaucracy. Wu’s regime was enforced via her secret police and involved the threat of hidden violence against all who would oppose her. But this was violence largely directed at the court. For commoners, Wu’s reign would have been relatively enlightened – she cut the military, promoted skilled officials, and gave much of royal land to commoners.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_CHAPTER_HISTORY_PARA_9]Internationally, Wu promoted Buddhism, even declaring herself to be Maitreya, the Buddha-to-be, but openly clashed with Tibet as well as western Turkic tribes. While Tibet remained independent, the Tibetan Empire lost the ground that it had taken in years past. And while Wu made inroads into Turkic areas, the Western nomadic powers were to have their day several centuries hence.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_QUOTE]Human beings cannot be resurrected. This is all destiny. The important thing is that those who are alive must continue to live.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_WU_ZETIAN_TITLE]Wu Zetian

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_YONGLE_CHAPTER_CAPSULE_BODY]Yongle controls his cities with Projects at first, and larger cities receive additional [ICON_Gold] Gold, [Icon_Science] Science, and [ICON_Culture] Culture from their population.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_YONGLE_CHAPTER_DETAILED_BODY]Yongle wants to control his population with his Lijia ability. In his cities, unique projects convert their [ICON_Production] Production into [ICON_Food] Food, [ICON_Faith] Faith or [ICON_Gold] Gold. Then, when the city reaches 10 population, the population celebrates with additional [ICON_Gold] Gold, [Icon_Science] Science, and [ICON_Culture] Culture. His civilization ability further helps his [Icon_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture progression with free and better Eurekas and Inspirations. The Crouching Tiger helps protect his empire from invaders, but it is the Great Wall that makes him a powerful force towards a Culture Victory.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_YONGLE_CHAPTER_HISTORY_PARA_1]The most forward-thinking and outward-looking of the Ming emperors, Yongle built the foundation for Ming’s international system and rebuilt its infrastructure. He did so via a ruthless bid for legitimacy, in which he destroyed all opposition to his claim but then expanded outward, gathering support and foreign gold for what was to become China’s quintessential empire.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_YONGLE_CHAPTER_HISTORY_PARA_10]Yongle died during a military campaign against the Mongols in 1424, at the age of 64.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_YONGLE_CHAPTER_HISTORY_PARA_2]The Ming Dynasty was a moment of reconsolidation for China, where, after years of foreign rule, the Han Chinese established a Han-centric power that was to last and remain prosperous for centuries. Ming was wealthy, peaceful, and… for a time… advanced. Ming was also successful in incorporating its neighbors into its orbit; the tributary system pulled much of East Asia together into a protection alliance that would lead to regional stability and the expansion of Confucian values. But over time, Ming fell into complacency and isolation, and while Ming entered the race well ahead of its competition, it emerged weakened, over-dependent on foreign gold, and unprepared for how the world had changed around it.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_YONGLE_CHAPTER_HISTORY_PARA_3]Such events might not have happened had the Yongle emperor had his way.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_YONGLE_CHAPTER_HISTORY_PARA_4]Yongle was born Zhu Di in 1360. He was the second son of another great Ming emperor – the Hongwu emperor. As such, he was an important person and a military commander who had been fighting the Mongols – both the remnants of the Yuan Dynasty as well as the great Khanates of the west. Zhu Di was next in line for the throne after his older brother, Zhu Biao. Well… so the story goes – others say Zhu Di was not at all the son of the Emperor’s primary consort but of a lesser concubine.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_YONGLE_CHAPTER_HISTORY_PARA_5]But Zhu Biao was his father’s favorite. And this favor extended to Biao’s family, including his son. So when Zhu Biao died suddenly, the Hongwu emperor named Zhu Biao’s son, not Zhu Di, as next in line… and Zhu Di went into rebellion.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_YONGLE_CHAPTER_HISTORY_PARA_6]Zhu Di fought a three-year war and won, renaming himself the Yongle Emperor. He then swept the bureaucracy ruthlessly for any trace of his nephew’s influence. This was considerable – recall the Confucian edicts to accept a peaceful rule, many scholars opposed the takeover. But many others were swept up in association - Yongle ordered the death of his enemies, especially the famous Fang Xiarou, but also everyone who had passed their exams during Fang’s tenure, all of Fang’s relatives (out to the tenth degree), and on, and on. Thousands were killed. Further, Yongle banned Mongolian cultural forms, something which had been predominant under the Yuan.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_YONGLE_CHAPTER_HISTORY_PARA_7]Yongle then set about making a new society. He expanded the role of the eunuchs, even including a secret police (the Eastern Depot) loyal to the emperor. He expanded, too, the scholars and historians – at least those who agreed to strike his nephew from history (and, some say, to rewrite history making Yongle the son of the Empress, not a Korean concubine). This rule extended, too, from a new source: the Forbidden City, built to mark Beijing as a new capital, closer to the Mongol lines (so as to better lead the war) and closer to Yongle’s old military outposts. With this came a reconstruction and re-fortification of the Great Wall and a re-opening of the Grand Canal.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_YONGLE_CHAPTER_HISTORY_PARA_8]Hongwu (Yongle’s father) was an isolationist; indeed, isolation was to be the plague of the Ming. But Yongle was rather the opposite. He actively cultivated and expanded the tribute system – indeed, this was what Zheng He’s voyages were all about – finding new potential tributaries. These trips went out to India, the Persian Gulf, and Africa, although tributaries really only came from East Asia. Significant here was the courting of Tibet – recall that Tibet remains a source of Buddhist knowledge for much of Chinese history; Ming is no different. Militarily speaking, Yongle attacked the Mongols and Vietnam, incorporating the latter into the Chinese empire and sparking the massacre of the Tran nobles.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_YONGLE_CHAPTER_HISTORY_PARA_9]Another achievement was the Yongle Dadian Encyclopedia, a massive work that encapsulated all Chinese knowledge to that point. There’s little new here, but a compilation of everything previously known.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_YONGLE_QUOTE]Many a state has fallen because a ruler does not know the affairs of his people.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PEDIA_LEADERS_PAGE_LEADER_YONGLE_TITLE]Yongle
